Package rules

Interface Summary
Evaluable To be implemented by all expressions.
InhabitantFactory Something that can instantiate new inhabitants.
 

Class Summary
Action Contains all information necessary to perform an action.
AddCommand Implements the add-command that adds or substracts a value to/from an attribute.
AndExpression Implements the AND-operation.
CheckFunction Implements the check-function that checks if there sits a certain inhabitant in a cell.
Command Super-class for all commands.
ConstExpression Implements const-expressions.
CountFunction Implements the count-function that counts how many inhabitants of a certain kind life in the environment of a cell.
CreateCommand Create a new inhabitant and put it into the current cell.
DeployCommand Implements the deploy-command that deploys the content of an attribute to all inhabitants in the environment.
EqualsExpression Implement 'equal to'.
GetValueFunction Implement the getValue-function that delivers the current value of an attribute.
KillCommand Implements the kill-command that empties a cell.
LessThanExpression Implements 'less than'
LessThanOrEqualExpression Implements 'less than or equal'
MoreThanExpression Implements 'more than'
MoreThanOrEqualExpression Implements 'more than or equal'
NotExpression Implements the not-operation.
Operation Superclass for all operations.
OrExpression Implements the or-operation.
Rule Implements a rule.
Skalar Implements a constant integer value.
XorExpression Implements the xor-operation.
